item.title: 6 reasons Microsoft has become the go-to for machine learning
item.description: 6 reasons Microsoft has become the go-to for machine learning [ read more ] Including the latest tools announced at Microsoft Build 2019 7 min read An Overview of Human Pose Estimation with Deep Learning [ read more ] An introduction to the techniques used in Human Pose Estimation based on Deep Learning. 9 min read Text Preprocessing in Python: Steps, Tools, and Examples [ read more ] by Olga Davydova, Data Monsters 7 min read
